title: (x) Quirky, modern slab - can't identify - Generell TW {Akira}
content:
Rather taken with this font - thought I had something similar in the drawer but it turns out I was mistaken. Anybody familiar with it? Source scanned from an Australian paper promotion piece (â€¦at small point size, so the image isn't the sharpest unfortunately).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204220530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_4925.jpg)
author: JohnS

comments.content: Ah, exactly so. Many thanks; that was quick!
